body:
Federico,

You have the examples at the link you provided ... though you need to build them.

Check these links: [1](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/view-analysis-without-self-occluding-geometry) and [2](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/photo/field-of-view-component)

Also attached a file that uses the LB_viewRose component (thanks to Mostapha for the geometry, at the time i did it).

-A.
